name: Stats:
description:
§oMax Shifts§r: 3
Height: 15, 14, 13
§oSpeed§r: 2.5, 2.25, 2.1
§oStrength§r: 5, 4.5, 4
§oHealth§r: 2, 1.9, 1.7
§oDefense§r: 1.5, 1.3, 1.25
§oDurability§r: 18
§oMinutes between shifts§r: 0.25, 3, 5
§oAverage minutes§r §oto§r §oregain§r §oa shift§r: 7

actions.command: execute as @s at @s run particle dust 1.0 1.0 0.0 1 ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 100 1 normal
execute as @s at @s run particle minecraft:electric_spark ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 0 1 normal

self_action.command: title @s actionbar "This weapon is too small for you"

actions.command: title @s actionbar "You're too big to ride that"
execute anchored feet facing ^1 ^ ^ run tp @e[tag=BeingGrabbedByTitan,distance=..30,sort=nearest,limit=1] ^ ^4.25 ^3
execute unless block ~ ~ ~ blue_ice run setblock ~ ~ ~ blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~ ~1 ~ blue_ice run setblock ~ ~1 ~ blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~ ~-1 ~ blue_ice run setblock ~ ~-1 ~ blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~ ~2 ~ blue_ice run setblock ~ ~2 ~ blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~1 ~ ~ blue_ice run setblock ~1 ~ ~ blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~ ~ ~1 blue_ice run setblock ~ ~ ~1 blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~-1 ~ ~ blue_ice run setblock ~-1 ~ ~ blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~ ~ ~-1 blue_ice run setblock ~ ~ ~-1 blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~1 ~1 ~ blue_ice run setblock ~1 ~1 ~ blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~ ~1 ~1 blue_ice run setblock ~ ~1 ~1 blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~-1 ~1 ~ blue_ice run setblock ~-1 ~1 ~ blue_ice destroy
execute unless block ~ ~1 ~-1 blue_ice run setblock ~ ~1 ~-1 blue_ice destroy

item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with titan_shifter_megapack:titan_skin_warhammer{Powers:[{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "mainhand", Negative: 0b},{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "offhand", Negative: 0b}],display:{Lore:['{"text":"Only usable by Titans"}'],Name:'{"text":"Titan-Skin Warhammer","color":"white","bold":true}'},Unbreakable:1b,WarhammerHardenedItem:1} 1

item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with titan_shifter_megapack:titan_skin_crossbow{Powers:[{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "mainhand", Negative: 0b},{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "offhand", Negative: 0b}],display:{Name:'{"text":"Titan-Skin Crossbow","color":"white","bold":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Only usable by Titans"}']},WarhammerHardenedItem:1b} 1

item replace entity @s weapon.offhand with titan_shifter_megapack:titan_skin_bolt{Powers:[{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "mainhand", Negative: 0b},{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "offhand", Negative: 0b}],display:{Name:'{"text":"Titan-Skin Bolt","color":"white","bold":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Only usable by Titans"}']},WarhammerHardenedItem:1} 1

item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with titan_shifter_megapack:titan_skin_bow{Powers:[{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "mainhand", Negative: 0b},{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "offhand", Negative: 0b}],display:{Name:'{"text":"Titan-Skin Bow","color":"white","bold":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Only usable by Titans"}']},WarhammerHardenedItem:1} 1

item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with titan_shifter_megapack:titan_skin_sword{Powers:[{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "mainhand", Negative: 0b},{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "offhand", Negative: 0b}],display:{Name:'{"text":"Titan-Skin Sword","color":"white","bold":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Only usable by Titans"}']},WarhammerHardenedItem:1} 1

item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with titan_shifter_megapack:titan_skin_axe{Powers:[{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "mainhand", Negative: 0b},{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "offhand", Negative: 0b}],display:{Name:'{"text":"Titan-Skin Axe","color":"white","bold":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Only usable by Titans"}']},WarhammerHardenedItem:1} 1
